alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Cerro Gordo; Franklin; Hamilton; Hancock; Hardin; Humboldt; Kossuth; Webster; Wright (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 6:56PM CDT until July 05 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hardin County in central Iowa... Webster County in central Iowa... Wright County in north central Iowa... Franklin County in north central Iowa... Southeastern Kossuth County in north central Iowa... Eastern Calhoun County in west central Iowa... Hancock County in north central Iowa... Eastern Humboldt County in north central Iowa... Southern Cerro Gordo County in north central Iowa... Hamilton County in central Iowa... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 656 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Belmond to 7 miles west of Big Wall Lake to 11 miles southeast of Fort Dodge to near Gowrie, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Dodge, Webster City, Iowa Falls, Hampton, Garner, Clarion, Eldora, Dakota City, Humboldt, Eagle Grove, Belmond, Britt, Lake City, Ackley, Jewell Junction, Sheffield, Rockwell, Gowrie, Fort Dodge Regional Airport and Big Wall Lake. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 127 and 191. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Cerro Gordo; Franklin; Hamilton; Hancock; Hardin; Humboldt; Kossuth; Webster; Wright
